    • 构造器详细资料

      • DevicePackageManager

        public DevicePackageManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • installPackage

        public void installPackage(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                           java.lang.String packagePath)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to install the specific apk silently on the device, for this user. After calling this, the specific apk of this user in packagePath will be installed on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        packagePath - the path of apk to be installed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • uninstallPackage

        public void uninstallPackage(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                             java.lang.String packageName,
                             boolean keepData)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to uninstall the specific apk silently on the device, for this user. After calling this, the specific apk of this user in packagePath will be installed on the device. And this function will not take effection on the system app.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        packageName - the package name of the app to be uninstalled.
        keepData - true if we want to keep app data,otherwise clear app data.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • clearPackageData

        public void clearPackageData(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                             java.lang.String packageName)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to clear app data on the device, for this user. After setting this, the specific app data of this user will be cleared. And this function will not take effection on the system app.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        packageName - the specific app data to be cleared.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • enableInstallPackage

        public void enableInstallPackage(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to enable installing app on the device, for this user. After setting this, this user can install app.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • disableInstallSource

        public void disableInstallSource(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> whitelist)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to limit install app source on the device, for this user. After setting this, this user can only install apps in whitelist app market,and sd card install or adb install is disallowed.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        whitelist - the specific package name app market
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isInstallSourceDisabled

        public boolean isInstallSourceDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not the device's app market has been limited for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to check if any admins have limited app market
        返回:
        true if app market has been limited, otherwise unlimited

      • getInstallPackageSourceWhiteList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInstallPackageSourceWhiteList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get app market whist list for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to get all app market white lists of all admins.
        返回:
        app market white list(s).

      • addInstallPackageWhiteList

        public void addInstallPackageWhiteList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        add package name(s) to app installation white list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can only install app when its' package name this list, and this function will not take effection on the system app.
        参数:
        admin - the admin of the list.
        packageNames - app package name list to be added.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeInstallPackageWhiteList

        public void removeInstallPackageWhiteList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        remove package name(s) from app installation white list by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - the admin of the list.
        packageNames - app package name list to be removed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getInstallPackageWhiteList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInstallPackageWhiteList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get app installation white list for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to get all app installation white lists of all admins.
        返回:
        package name(s) of installation app white list.

      • addDisallowedUninstallPackages

        public void addDisallowedUninstallPackages(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        add package name(s) to disallowed uninstall app list by the current admin.After setting this, this user can not uninstall the app when its' package name in this list.
        参数:
        admin - the admin of the list.
        packageNames - app package name list to be added.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeDisallowedUninstallPackages

        public void removeDisallowedUninstallPackages(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> packageNames)
        remove package name(s) from disallowed uninstall app list by the current admin.
        参数:
        admin - the admin of the list.
        packageNames - app package name list to be removed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_APP_MANAGEMENT} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getDisallowedUninstallPackageList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDisallowedUninstallPackageList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get disallowed uninstall app list for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to get all disallowed uninstall app lists of all admins.
        返回:
        package name(s) of disallowed running app list.

      • getAllowNotificationApps

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllowNotificationApps(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        get allow app white list for this user, either by the current admin, if specified, or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component to check, or null to get all app installation white lists of all admins.
